body: query {productschedulelist (pagination:{limit: "10"}){ productschedules { id, name, emailtemplates { id },schedule { price, start, end, period, samedayofmonth, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } } }, merchantprovidergroup{ id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio}, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } }, }
